title: Init (Method)
text:
METHOD Init
Initialization function to initialize the environment extender of the
alarm generator. This function is called by code generated by the alarm
generator.
Note
When using Event-Alarms
IAcAlarmExtender2.Init2
must be used!

rows.Name: pModCall
rows.Comment:
A pointer to a list of all module calls available under an application.
The latter list is created by the alarm generator during an application
composer generation.

rows:
The number of module call defined in the list pointed to by
pModCall.
